attributes.action: Stop SKY TV holding a leaders debate.
attributes.additional_details: SKY TV have been advertising the petition for a leaders debate for the last 6 months. This is not ethical.
attributes.background: Stop SKY TV holding a leaders debate. The Petition started by SKY has been constantly advertised by SKY for there own gain.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because under existing arrangements this would be the responsibility of the political parties and broadcasters and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229623
